examples.korean: He has netted 21 goals so far this season. 발음듣기 그는 이번 시즌에 지금까지 21골을 넣었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He has netted 21 goals so far this season. 발음

examples.korean: United conceded two goals in the first half. 발음듣기 유나이티드가 전반전에 두 골을 내주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: United conceded two goals in the first half. 발음

examples.korean: Two minutes later Ford equalized with a penalty. 발음듣기 2분 후에 포드가 페널티골로 동점을 만들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Two minutes later Ford equalized with a penalty. 발음

examples.korean: The team has notched up 20 goals already this season. 발음듣기 그 팀은 이번 시즌에만 이미 20골을 올렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The team has notched up 20 goals already this season. 발음

examples.korean: Arsenal scored three late goals in a storming finish. 발음듣기 아스날이 에너지 넘치는 마무리로 뒤늦게 3골을 올렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Arsenal scored three late goals in a storming finish. 발음
